content.raw: It's true that `*args` is less useful, but `**kwargs` still has benefits. I'll adapt the implementation to take optional `args` and `kwargs` arguments which will each be passed by the appropriate protocol to the target function, but also still accept arbitrary keyword arguments that will just be added to `kwargs`.
content.html: It's true that *args is less useful, but **kwargs still has benefits. I'll adapt the implementation to take optional args and kwargs arguments which will each be passed by the appropriate protocol to the target function, but also still accept arbitrary keyword arguments that will just be added to kwargs.
